commits.message: fix(hero): Reposition mobile 3D orbit text and refine spin effect
feat(hero): Add click-to-spin roulette effect and reposition 3D orbit text
fix(email): Update quote contact text to use explicit sales email
feat(email): Add email tracking and complete Resend migration
feat(hero): Add drag-to-spin 3D rotating text with momentum
fix(admin): Sync leadTimeText with leadTime on product save
fix(middleware): Remove 9 more redirects blocking actual products
fix(middleware): Remove redirect blocking galvanised foot valve product
revert: Remove 3D text mouse effects (OrbitalLayer, WatchBezel)
fix(home): Vertical mouse movement rotates same axis as horizontal
feat(home): Add watch bezel effect to teal curved text
style(home): Reduce search bar size by 20%
feat(home): Replace DepthLayer with OrbitalLayer for curved text
feat(home): Reposition orbiting curved text elements
fix(routes): Remove conflicting product redirects from middleware
feat(email): Migrate from nodemailer/SMTP to Resend HTTP API

current.title: Migration Plan
current.summary: Full-scope migration from Vite+Express+Neto to Next.js 14 App Router with Neon PostgreSQL, custom admin panel, and Vercel deployment. Covers 13 phases from analysis through cleanup.

current.title: Analysis
current.summary: Reference document with initial codebase analysis for the migration project.

current.title: Hosting
current.summary: Reference document covering hosting configuration and deployment details.

current.title: Pointers
current.summary: Reference document with code pointers and architectural notes.

current.title: Services
current.summary: Reference document listing third-party services and integrations used by the project.

current.title: Setup Guide
current.summary: Setup guide for local development environment configuration.

current.title: Database Architecture
current.summary: Database schema documentation covering Phase 3 (schema) and Phase 7 (admin panel) of the migration. All checkboxes complete.

current.title: Admin Panel Overhaul
current.summary: Comprehensive admin panel improvements covering critical bugs, product builder, quote cart UI, logistics page, sidebar layout, inventory table, and testing. All 156 checkboxes complete.

current.title: Admin Panel V2
current.summary: Bug fixes and UI polish for the admin panel post-V1 overhaul: logo sizing, quote count sync, table overflow, sticky headers, and mobile navigation gaps.

current.title: Admin Subcategory Pages
current.summary: Enable full CRUD management of subcategory pages from the admin panel. Currently hardcoded static files but database schema already supports dynamic content.

current.title: Basket Strainer Content Scrape
current.summary: Scrape all basket strainer product pages from the live Neto site to collect any missing images, videos, and datasheets not migrated to the new site.

current.title: Bug Fixes January 2026
current.summary: Collection of bugs and improvements identified during SEO review and testing, including broken pipe couplings brand links.

current.title: Custom Size Request
current.summary: Add a "Can't see your size?" section to product pages allowing customers to request quotes for non-standard sizes, primarily for Straub/Teekay products.

current.title: Datasheet Migration
current.summary: Audit all product datasheets across database, local files, and external sources. Migrate missing/broken datasheets to Vercel Blob storage after old Neto site PDFs started returning 404.

current.title: Email Resend Migration
current.summary: Replace nodemailer/SMTP with Resend HTTP API to eliminate transient SMTP connection failures in serverless. Fix critical bug where email failures return success to customers. Add database-backed email delivery logging.

current.title: Header Cart Size Fixes
current.summary: Fix header menu hover highlighting, cart scroll wheel affecting page, and size label improvements.

current.title: Homepage & UI Polish
current.summary: Consolidated UI/UX improvements for the homepage and site-wide polish. Includes hero section refinements, search bar styling, and visual enhancements across brand and category pages.

current.title: Internal Link Audit
current.summary: Quality assurance audit triggered by broken /valves link. Addresses manual data entry issues, lack of automated link checking, and route naming inconsistencies.

current.title: Mobile Polish
current.summary: Mobile-only CSS improvements to polish the mobile experience without affecting desktop layout. All changes use mobile breakpoints.

current.title: Playwright Test Findings
current.summary: Reference document with test findings from Playwright test runs.

current.title: Product Linkage Audit
current.summary: Audit to identify active products without accessible pages and product pages not linked from any category or subcategory page.

current.title: Project Cleanup
current.summary: Remove unused files, clean database orphans, and investigate freezing issues. Project had accumulated ~190MB of deprecated files plus 902MB .next cache.

current.title: Quote System
current.summary: Transform the quote system into fully automated formal quotes. Customers receive complete quotes (PDF + email) instantly with 99% requiring zero manual intervention.

current.title: Redirect Management
current.summary: Admin panel feature to manage URL redirects with database storage, cached middleware lookup, and CSV import/export.

current.title: Remove SendGrid
current.summary: Replace SendGrid with Google Workspace SMTP to fix deliverability issues. Superseded by email-resend-migration which moved to Resend HTTP API instead.

current.title: SEO Content Optimization
current.summary: Implement targeted SEO improvements based on audit findings. Focus on content and text changes only with no design changes.

current.title: Ticker & Search Polish
current.summary: Visual polish for the discount ticker (drop shadow, water wave effect) and functional fix for search results page query handling.

current.title: Variation Stock & Ranking
current.summary: Enhance product admin to support explicit size ranking (1-5000) for sort order and per-variation stock quantity display/editing.

current.title: Volume Discount UX
current.summary: Enhance product pages to explain that volume discounts apply to total cart quantity and show current applicable discount tier before adding items.

current.title: Post-Launch Redirects
current.summary: 301 redirects from old Neto site URLs to new Next.js site URLs, implemented in middleware STATIC_REDIRECTS object.
